Disappearing NightSickle?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Shrine Topics (Disc & Encyclopedia): Disappearing NightSickle?
By Powerball22 on Thursday, March 4, 2004 - 04:13 pm:

I recently shrined a NightSickle (Ripper/?) from the Final Fantasy X disc. I brought it to the ranch, and everything was normal (training, book entry, etc). However, when I combined it with a frozen monster, it disappeared from my book! Has anyone else had a similar experience?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, March 4, 2004 - 06:34 pm:

Yeah, actually, something like that happened to me when I was playing the Japanese version of the game. It re-appeared at some point in my book, but it was very, very odd.
